Quick Onboarding

Welcome to EchoPilotAI! Follow these steps to get up and running quickly.

  1. 1

    Pick a plan on /pricing and complete checkout

  2. 2

    Connect to Stripe portal via /account for billing management

  3. 3

    Create your first workflow on /workflow

  4. 4

    Set up Telegram alerts for real-time notifications

  5. 5

    Invite teammates to collaborate (Business+ plans)
